mapper.insert: INSERT INTO JYL_PDS (SEQ, ID,TITLE,CONTENT, FILENAME,READCOUNT,DOWNCOUNT, REGDATE) VALUES(seq_JYL_PDS.NEXTVAL, #{id},#{title},#{content}, #{filename},0,0, SYSDATE)
mapper.update: UPDATE JYL_PDS SET TITLE=#{title}, CONTENT=#{content}, FILENAME=#{filename}, REGDATE=SYSDATE WHERE SEQ=#{seq}
mapper.select: SELECT SEQ, ID,TITLE,CONTENT, FILENAME,READCOUNT,DOWNCOUNT, REGDATE FROM JYL_PDS order by seq
SELECT SEQ, ID,TITLE,CONTENT, FILENAME,READCOUNT,DOWNCOUNT, REGDATE FROM JYL_PDS WHERE SEQ=#{seq}
